full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
==========================

**Title:** System Analyzer
**UNSPSC Code:** 32130000 - Electronic hardware and component parts and accessories

**Reference Number:** WS4354833826-Doc4449985489
**Solicitation Number:** WS4354833826
**Publication Date:** February 19, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** March 6, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
**Expected Contract Start Date:** March 28, 2024
**Expected Contract End Date:** April 1, 2025

**Background:**
[Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)](/PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement E60HN-16ELEC for the acquisition of a System Analyzer. The procurement is subject to the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, and other international trade agreements.

**Summary:**
DND requires the following items as per the list of Deliverables in the RFP: OR EQUIVALENT (Compatible sensor hardware includes Keysight FieldFox Models N9915B, N9916B, N9917B, and N9918B models).

**Scope:**
The contract will be entered into by and between the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) and the selected supplier.

**Evaluation Criteria:**
The proposal will be evaluated based on lowest price.

**Process:**
Please refer to the RFP document attached to this notice for the complete process and procedures.

**Queries:**
For any queries, please contact the Contracting Authority at (SPAC/PSPC) at [allison.fernandez@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:allison.fernandez@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

**Notice URL:** https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18835192?extsite=MTg4MzUxOTJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
([FRENCH VERSION](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18835192?extsite=MTg4MzUxOTJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==))

**Responders:**
Please submit your proposal electronically to
